function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of private space in homes during pandemic","Impact":"Increased stress and discomfort for residents","Mitigation":"Designing homes with more private spaces or adaptable layouts","Technologies":"Flexible building designs, sound insulation, antimicrobial materials","People":"Residents in homes during the pandemic","Owner":"Architects and building designers"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and air quality in homes","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems and using antimicrobial materials","Technologies":"Better ventilation systems, antimicrobial materials","People":"Residents in homes during the pandemic","Owner":"Architects and building designers"},{"Description":"Inadequate solid-waste management in homes","Impact":"Increased risk of contamination and infection","Mitigation":"Implementing better solid-waste management systems","Technologies":"Touchless technologies for waste disposal","People":"Residents in homes during the pandemic","Owner":"Local authorities and waste management companies"}]}
